sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import Button from 'components/Button' import { gaEvent } from 'utils/ga' import * as S from './styles' import { PricingBoxProps } from 'types/api' const onClick = () => gaEvent({ action: 'click', category: 'buy', label: 'pricing box button' }) const PricingBox = ({ totalPrice, numberInstallments, priceInstallment, benefis, button }: PricingBoxProps) => ( De R${totalPrice} por apenas {numberInstallments}x de R${priceInstallment} ) export default PricingBox
